Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes scored the winning penalty in the 88th minute after Mauritania's Yassin El Welly made a mistake
Cape Verde advanced to the quarter-finals of AFCON 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde's captain Ryan Mendes was praised for his decisive penalty
Mauritania's impressive run in AFCON ended with this defeat
Others: The match was Cape Verde's first knockout game in AFCON history
